description: My place is close to to the E/F train for a swift ride to midtown Manhattan (25 mins).  You can take a $7 Uber to Austin St. in Forest Hills for bars and nightlife.  The Long Island Rail Road is also there for a 15 min ride to Penn Station Manhattan. There is a terrace off the living room to enjoy a few minutes outside as well as a rooftop with views of the NYC Skyline.  The bedroom has a king sized tempur-pedic mattress  with a 80 inch TV in the living room.  Enjoy a great stay in NYC!
name: Great Location: Visit NYC and Enjoy
review: Evan was great! He checked and asked if I need any help during my stay. I made myself feel like home , and cleaned up like I wasn't even there. I love his living room the most. Great size , awesome TV and cool fishes. I would definitely recommend staying at Evans.
